data.thought: S46|H|S40|Hybrid Phenotype H6: 'Codebase Immune System'. Combines: Reactive (B2 webhook) + Multi-system (C3 incident) + Swarm (A3 evolutionary). Always-on guardian. On commit: security scan notebook activates. On anomaly: diagnostic notebooks spawn. On breach: containment notebooks isolate. Evolutionary: learns from past incidents, improves detection. Observable: threat landscape, defense posture, learning curve. Emergent: codebase that actively defends itself. Like an immune system with AI antibodies.
